mapper.select: select * from comment where post=#{post} and cmt_no=#{cmt_no}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(post, cmt_no, writer, content, date, parent) VALUES(#{post}, #{cmt_no}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{date}, #{parent})
mapper.update: update comment set content=#{content} where writer=#{writer} and cmt_no=#{cmt_no} and post=#{post}
mapper.delete: update comment set delFlag=#{delFlag} where writer=#{writer} and cmt_no=#{cmt_no} and post=#{post}
